Sentencas: In this investigation porous Ni/YSZ composite SOFC anode structures were produced by adding separate Ni and graphite (pore former) particles and/or by adding Ni coated graphite powder to a tape casting suspension.
Titulo: Influence of porous composite microstructure on the processing and properties of solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The porous volume increased with an increase in graphite content in a similar manner regardless of low the graphite was added (i.e. separately or as the core of a coated powder).
Titulo: Influence of porous composite microstructure on the processing and properties of solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The sintering shrinkage of the anodes decreased with an increase in the Ni content.
Titulo: Influence of porous composite microstructure on the processing and properties of solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: Both sintering behaviour and the CTE of sintered and reduced anodes were similar regardless of how the Ni was added.
Titulo: Influence of porous composite microstructure on the processing and properties of solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: However for a given Ni content the electrical conductivity was dramatically improved when Ni was added as a coating on a graphite powder.
Titulo: Influence of porous composite microstructure on the processing and properties of solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: This behaviour was explained on the basis of an effective Ni content, V-Nieff, which includes the graphite portion of the coated particle.
Titulo: Influence of porous composite microstructure on the processing and properties of solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: In the green tape, V-Nieff controls the creation of a percolating network of Ni.
Titulo: Influence of porous composite microstructure on the processing and properties of solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: However, when the graphite bums away it leaves a percolated Ni network at a much lower volume fraction than would be required from a dense Ni particle.
Titulo: Influence of porous composite microstructure on the processing and properties of solid oxide fuel cell anodes
Influence of porous composite microstructure on the processing and properties of solid oxide fuel cell anodes
